Notes.Text:
This update for ffmpeg fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-38171: Fixed adts_decode_extradata in libavformat/adtsenc.c to check the init_get_bits return value (bsc#1189724).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: adts_decode_extradata in libavformat/adtsenc.c in FFmpeg 4.4 does not check the init_get_bits return value, which is a necessary step because the second argument to init_get_bits can be crafted.
